properties.script:
import base64

base64_message = "$activity.definition_activity_01X6UNPG9ATMV4PGKLIe0Us2a0icHla7ZIQ.output.jsonpath_queries.content$"
base64_bytes = base64_message.encode('ascii')
message_bytes = base64.b64decode(base64_bytes)
decoded_content = message_bytes.decode('ascii')
